column5: 10 minutes from from Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport, Verizon Theater at Grand Prairie, Lone Star Park at Grand Prairie, Airhogs Stadium, Six Flags Over Texas and Six Flags Hurricane Harbor. 15 minutes from AT&T Stadium and Globe Life Park. Equidistant between downtowns Dallas and Fort Worth (approx. 17 miles each way) via I-30.
